metadata.name: Gladiolus
metadata.description:
I grew up with, and was raised by women.
My mother, my neighbour- Amma and her daughters. 
Apart from school, most of my time was spent under a woman's influence.

My dad was always working, and even though he loves me and gave enough time to me, 
it was the women in my life who shaped me into a kind and compassionate being. 

Although I studied in an all boys school, majority of my best friends were and still are female.
I found my gentler and kinder side with them and for that I am grateful!

These women taught me lessons.
Lessons of moral integrity and faithfulness.

Society is of the notion that women are the weaker sex.
But day in and day out, all I saw was strength. 
I saw passion.
I saw primordial energy!
